data.title: "GAME OF DEATH" MOVIE POSTER
data.meta_description: U.S.A. Columbia Pictures Industries Inc., 1979. One Sheet 27 in. x 41 in. In Good condition. Moderate plus creasing throughout. Top left corner missing. Several tape markings throughout. Light staining. Shelved in Room A. FJ Consignment.
